channel.title: Excel on Mark Gingrass Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: Useful Excel Template Building with VBA Range Methods and Objects!
item.description: Learn practical code now! Begin using this code immediately in the workforce! This tutorial will guide you through the use of ranges and how to extract values from cells and input values into cells. In this tutorial you will learn the basics of: Option Explicit - Why use it? Range - Useful for template building and more. Objects - What are they and tell me more!

item.title: Overview of the VBA Editor, Reading VBA Code, and Eliminating Waste
item.description: [embed]https://youtu.be/GNulOwQT0mk[/embed] Overview of the VBA Editor, Reading VBA Code, and Eliminating Waste First, a quick overview of how to record and run macros. Then the tutorial shows the user how to manually check the VBA code for a particular macro. How to change module names and macro names. Also a few key terms such as Integrated Development Environment (IDE). A few key takeaways form this tutorial. Open the VBA Editor

item.title: Very First VBA Excel Macro Tutorial for Beginners
item.description: Recording your first Macro with Microsoft Excel Have you ever had a task that you repeat over and over again in Microsoft Excel? This tutorial will teach the absolute beginner how to start recording and using macros. This will make your work day much more efficient. So click the short video and start being more productive! [embed]https://youtu.be/9-_UZBBM3RQ[/embed] Quick Start Guide: How To Record First Macro Click on File and select Options.
